global.name: Név
global.txvalidationerr: Tranzakció érvényesítési hiba (időtúllépés): a hálózat nem volt megbízhatóan elérhető a tranzakció érvényesítéséhez
global.subject: Tárgy
global.biometryIsNotSupported: A biometrikus hitelesítés nem támogatott ezen az eszközön!
global.biometricChangeError: A biometrikus hitelesítés le van tiltva a biometrikus adatok vagy a rendszerbeállítások változása miatt az eszközön. Kérjük, engedélyezze újra a biometrikus hitelesítést a Beállítások -> Biztonság -> Biometrikus hitelesítés menüpontban
global.pleaseEnterYourPasscode: Kérem, adja meg a PIN kódját
global.tooManyAttempts: Túl sok sikertelen próbálkozás. Kérem, próbálja újra %{after} perc múlva.
global.passcodeAttemptExceed: PIN kód próbálkozások száma túllépve, kérem próbálja később.
global.autoWipeAlert: Az alkalmazás feloldására %{times} alkalommal próbált sikertelenül, 1 további sikertelen próbálkozás után az alkalmazás visszaáll és minden fiókadata elvész.
global.cannotValidateCurrentTimeWithServer: Az alkalmazás ideje nem szinkronizálható a szerver idejével. Győződjön meg róla, hogy csatlakozik az internethez!
global.unableOpenReturnURL: A visszatérési URL nem nyitható meg!
global.pleaseAddAccountToSignTheTransaction: Kérem, adjon hozzá egy fiókot a tranzakció aláírásához
global.pleaseAddAccountToAccessXApp: Kérem, adjon hozzá egy fiókot az xApp eléréséhez
global.noSpendableAccountIsAvailableForSendingP: Jelenleg nincs elérhető egyenleg fizetések küldéséhez.
global.pleaseCheckSessionLogForMoreInfo: További információért kérem, ellenőrizze a munkamenet naplókat!
global.signedTransactionDetectedSubmit: Aláírt tranzakció észlelve, elküldjük a főkönyvbe?
global.weNeedYourPermissionToUseYourCamera: Szükségünk van az engedélyére a kamera használatához
global.looksLikeYouAreOffline: Úgy tűnik, offline módban van (nincs internetkapcsolat)
global.unableToConnectToXRPLNodePleaseCheckYour: Nem sikerült csatlakozni az XRPL csomóponthoz, kérem ellenőrizze az internetkapcsolatát és próbálja újra
global.pressBackAgainToExit: Nyomja meg újra a vissza gombot a kilépéshez
global.thisAccountIsReportedAsScamOrFraudulentA: Ez a feladó gyanús tevékenység miatt lett megjelölve, például spam miatt. Kérem, ellenőrizze kétszer is a tranzakciót, hogy megvédje az eszközeit.
global.biometricIsNotAvailable: A biometrikus azonosítás (ujjlenyomat vagy Face ID) nem elérhető. Ha az eszköz támogatja a biometrikus hitelesítést, kérem először állítsa be (OS beállítások).
global.pushErrorPermissionMessage: Nem sikerült regisztrálni a push értesítéseket. Ez kapcsolódási problémák miatt lehet, amelyek megakadályozzák az FCM token lekérését a Firebase szerverekről. Kérjük, győződjön meg róla, hogy aktív internetkapcsolattal rendelkezik. Alternatívaként a szükséges értesítési engedély megadásához menjen a rendszerbeállításokba, és győződjön meg róla, hogy a Xaman > Értesítések engedélyezve vannak.
global.UnableToRegisterPushNotifications: Nem sikerült regisztrálni a push értesítéseket
global.thePasswordYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: A megadott jelszó helytelen. Tranzakció aláírásához a megfelelő jelszót kell megadnia. Ezt a jelszót akkor adta meg, amikor hozzáadta a fiókot, amellyel alá szeretne írni a Xaman-hoz.
global.thePasscodeYouEnteredIsIncorrectExplain: A megadott PIN kód helytelen. Tranzakció aláírásához a megfelelő PIN kódot kell megadnia. Ezt a PIN kódot akkor adta meg, amikor először beállította a Xaman-t.
global.unableToFetchCurrencyRate: Nem sikerült lekérni a pénznem árfolyamát, kérem győződjön meg róla, hogy csatlakozik az internethez
global.theAmountIsTooSmallToDisplay:
Az összeg túl kicsi a megjelenítéshez:
 %{amount}
global.xAppWantsToOpenURLNotice:
A(z) ' %{xapp} ' xApp meg szeretné nyitni ezt az URL-t:

 %{url}
global.xAppWantsToSendSessionLogs:
Ez az xApp a 'Munkamenet naplókat' kéri. A munkamenet naplók nem tartalmaznak személyes információkat, kivéve a fiók címeit és a főkönyv kapcsolat naplózását.

Ha először meg szeretné vizsgálni a munkamenet napló tartalmát, látogasson el a Beállítások - Részletes - Munkamenet napló menüpontba.

Engedélyezi az alkalmazásnak a munkamenet napló információk elérését?
global.transactionFeeIsNotSet: A tranzakciós díj nincs beállítva, kérem várjon, amíg a tranzakciós díj beállításra kerül és próbálja újra!
global.unableToSetAccountSequence: Nem sikerült beállítani a fiók sorszámot, kérem ellenőrizze, hogy csatlakozik-e az internethez.
global.unableToGetLastClosedLedger: Nem sikerült lekérni az utolsó lezárt főkönyvet, kérem ellenőrizze, hogy csatlakozik-e az internethez.
global.hookFeeNotice: Megjegyzés: A teljes tranzakciós díj tartalmaz egy %{hookFee} %{nativeAsset} hook díjat.
global.unableToLoadNetworkFee: Nem sikerült betölteni a hálózati díjat!
global.doNotCloseTheApp:
NE zárja be a Xaman-t
NE zárolja az eszközt
global.selectCurve: Kérem, válassza ki a kulcspárhoz használandó görbét (ha rossz görbét választ, rossz r-címet kap és nem tud aláírni)

onboarding.slideOne_title:
Fizetések és
fizetési kérések
a főkönyvön
onboarding.slideTwo_desc: Több fiók hozzáadása, teljes hozzáférési módban vagy csak olvasásra. Tranzakciók küldése és aláírási kérések a teljes hozzáférésű fiókjaival.
onboarding.slideThree_desc: A Xaman alkalmazás és platform biztonsággal prioritásként lett felépítve. Soha többé ne adja meg a titkos kulcsait, írja alá a tranzakciókat a saját megbízható eszközéről.
onboarding.slideFour_desc: Küldhetsz és fogadhatsz XRP-t és egyéb megbízható tokeneket is
onboarding.v2homepage_noacc2: Importálja meglévő fiókját vagy hozzon létre újat.

setupPasscode.passCodeDescription: A PIN kódot az alkalmazás zárolására, a beállítások megerősítésére és a fiók biztonságának megőrzésére használjuk.
setupPasscode.setPasscode: Kérem, állítsa be a PIN kódját
setupPasscode.repeatPasscode: Kérem, ismételje meg az új PIN kódját
setupPasscode.warnNeedPasscode: Szüksége lesz a PIN kódjára az alkalmazás feloldásához
setupPasscode.UnableToStoreThePasscode: Nem sikerült menteni a PIN kódot. Ez nem fordulhat elő. Hibajelentés lett elküldve a Xaman támogatási csapatnak. Kérjük, lépjen kapcsolatba velünk a support@xaman.app címen további információért.
setupPasscode.weakPasscodeDescription: A kiválasztott PIN kód könnyen kitalálható. Javasoljuk, hogy válasszon erősebbet.

setupBiometry.biometryDescription: Hogy fiókját biztonságosabbá tegye, aktiválhatja a biometrikus hitelesítést (FaceID /TouchID).

setupPermissions.permissionDescription: Push értesítéseket használunk aláírási kérések küldésére
setupPermissions.pushRegisterError: Úgy tűnik, jelenleg nem tudtuk engedélyezni a push értesítéseket. Később aktiválhatja őket az alkalmazás beállításaiban a Beállítások -> Részletes menüpontban. Ne aggódjon, most folytathatja a beállítást!

setupTermOfService.XamanNotCustodialExplain:
A Xaman egy önrendelkezésű tárca, ami azt jelenti, hogy az eszközei nem a Xaman letétkezelésében vannak, hanem a főkönyvön 'élnek'.

Csak Ön férhet hozzá az eszközeihez a fiók titkos kulcsaival, amelyeket a Xaman generált vagy amelyeket importált a Xaman-ba.

Ez azt jelenti, hogy a Xaman és a Xaman csapata nem tud hozzáférni és nem tudja visszaállítani az eszközeit, ha hibát követ el vagy elveszíti a titkos kulcsait.
setupTermOfService.KeepYourSecretsSafeExplain:
Csak Ön, a fiók titkos kulcsa(i) használatával férhet hozzá az eszközeihez.

Ön és csak Ön felel azok biztonságos, offline tárolásáért.

Írja le a biztonsági mentéseit több offline helyen.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeAndOffline: Biztonságban és offline tartom a titkos kulcsaimat.
setupTermOfService.transactionsArePermanentExplain:
A Xaman nem tudja visszafordítani a tranzakciókat, vagy visszaállítani az eszközöket, ha hibát követ el.

A tranzakciók azonnaliak és visszafordíthatatlanok.
setupTermOfService.iAmResponsibleForKeepingMyKeysAndFundsSa: Felelős vagyok a kulcsaim és eszközeim biztonságáért
setupTermOfService.yourFundsLiveOnTheXRPLedgerExplain:
A Xaman egy főkönyv kliens alkalmazás.

Ez azt jelenti, hogy az XRP nem a Xaman-ben található, hanem a főkönyvön.

A küldött és fogadott tranzakciók élőben vannak küldve és fogadva a főkönyvön.
setupTermOfService.myFundsAreRegisteredOnTheXRPLedger: Minden eszközöm a főkönyvön van tárolva és regisztrálva, nem a Xaman alkalmazásban
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecret: SOHA ne ossza meg a titkos kulcsait
setupTermOfService.neverShareYourSecretExplain:
A Xaman és a Xaman támogatási részleg SOHA nem fogja kérni a titkos kulcsát

Ha valaki mégis kéri, vagy arra kéri, hogy írja be valahova a titkos kulcsát, akkor átverik.

Kérjük, vegye fel velünk a kapcsolatot minél több információval az eseményről.
setupTermOfService.IWillNeverGiveMySecretsToAnyone: Soha nem osztom meg a titkos kulcsaimat senkivel és sehol máshol nem adom meg
setupTermOfService.whenYouChangeYourPhoneExplain: A Xaman új eszközzel történő használatához újra meg kell adnia a titkos kulcsokat minden korábban létrehozott fiókhoz.
setupTermOfService.IWillKeepMySecretsSafeSoICanReEnterThemI: Biztonságban és offline tartom a titkos fiók kulcsaimat, hogy újra megadhassam őket, ha új eszközt kapok.
setupTermOfService.questionsAndSupportExplain:
Kérjük, ne habozzon kapcsolatba lépni velünk, ha további kérdése van. Kétség esetén soha ne folytassa és először ellenőrizzen a támogatási csapatunkkal.

GYIK és súgóközpontunk itt található: https://support.xaman.app.

A támogatás elérhető az alkalmazásban, a "Xaman Support" xApp-on keresztül. Kérjük, ne bízzon a közösségi médiában található támogatási csatornákban.
setupTermOfService.IOnlyTrustAnswersFromXamanSupportTeam: Csak a Xaman támogatási csapatának válaszaiban bízom a https://support.xaman.app oldalon
setupTermOfService.pleaseReadTheTextAboveCarefully: Kérjük, olvassa el figyelmesen a fenti szöveget

home.otherAssetsDesc: A főkönyv lehetővé teszi más eszközök egyenlegeinek tartását is
home.emptyAccountAddFirstAccount: It’s a little bit empty here add your first account.
home.shareReadonlyAccountWarning: Birtokolja a kulcsokat ehhez a csak olvasási fiókhoz vagy ez egy tőzsdei fiók?
home.exchangeAccountReadonlyExplain: Nem tud közvetlenül befizetni a tőzsdei fiókjára az áthaladás miatt. A Xaman-ból történő befizetéshez olvassa el:

events.thirdPartyTxExplain: Ez a tranzakció nem befolyásolta az Ön fiókja egyenlegét.
events.canNotFetchTransactions: Nem sikerült lekérdezni a fiók tranzakcióit!
events.canNotFetchSignRequests: Nem sikerült lekérdezni a fiók aláírási kéréseit!
events.unableToLoadTheTransaction: Unable to load the transaction, please make sure you are connected to internet!
events.emptyEventsNoAccount: There are no events because you do not have an account.
events.offerTransactionExplain: %{address} offered to pay %{takerGetsValue} %{takerGetsCurrency} in order to receive %{takerPaysValue} %{takerPaysCurrency}

Completion was triggered by %{address}
The escrowed amount of %{amount} %{currency} was delivered to %{destination}

events.itWasInstructedToDeliverTheRemainingBala: It was instructed to deliver the remaining balance of %{amount} %{currency} to %{destination}
events.theCheckHasASourceTag: The Check has a Source Tag: %{tag}
events.theCheckHasADestinationTag: The check has a destination Tag: %{tag}
events.maximumAmountCheckIsAllowToDebit: Maximum amount of source currency the Check is allowed to debit the sender is %{value} %{currency}
events.itWasInstructedToDeliverByCashingCheck: It was instructed to deliver %{amount} %{currency} to %{address} by cashing check with ID %{checkId}
events.theTransactionWillCancelCheckWithId: The transaction will cancel check with ID %{checkId}
events.itAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThisAccount: It authorizes %{address} to send payments to this account
events.itRemovesAuthorizesSendingPaymentsToThis: It removes the authorization for %{address} to send payments to this account
events.itEstablishesTrustLineTo: It establishes %{limit} as the maximum amount of %{currency} from %{issuer} that %{address} is willing to hold.
events.itSetsAccountDomainTo: It sets the account domain to %{domain}
events.itSetsAccountEmailHashTo: Beállítja a fiók email hash-ét erre: %{emailHash}
events.itRemovesTheAccountMessageKey: It removes the account message key
events.itSetsAccountMessageKeyTo: It sets the account message key to %{messageKey}
events.itRemovesTheAccountTransferRate: It removes the account transfer rate
events.itSetsAccountTransferRateTo: It sets the account transfer rate to %{transferRate}
events.itSetsAccountWalletLocatorTo: It sets the account wallet locator to %{walletLocator}
events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletLocator: It removes the account's wallet locator
events.itSetsAccountWalletSizeTo: It sets the account wallet size to %{walletSize}
events.itRemovesTheAccountWalletSize: It removes the account's wallet size
events.itCreatesTicketForThisAccount: It creates %{ticketCount} ticket(s) for this account.
events.pleaseReleaseThisEscrowUsingTheToolUsedT: Please release this escrow using the tool / platform used to create it. Xaman cannot release the escrow as there is an Escrow Condition present on it.
events.accountWillCreateAPaymentChannelTo: The account %{account} will create a payment channel to %{destination}
events.accountCreatedAPaymentChannelTo: The account %{account} created a payment channel to %{destination}
events.theChannelHasASettlementDelay: The channel has a settlement delay of %{delay} seconds

events.thePaymentChannelWillBeClosed: The payment channel will be closed. Any remaining funds will be returned to the source account.
events.thisTransactionIncreaseAccountReserve: This transaction increased the account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
events.thisTransactionDecreaseAccountReserve: This transaction decreased the account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
events.nfTokenBurnExplain: The transaction will burn NFT token with ID %{tokenID}
events.nfTokenModifyExplain: The transaction will modify NFT token with ID %{tokenID}, and the URI value will be %{uri}

events.theTokenTaxonForThisTokenIs: Ennek a tokennek a Taxon értéke %{taxon}
events.nftOfferSellExplain: %{address} offered to sell NFT token with ID %{tokenID} in order to receive %{amount} %{currency}
events.nftOfferBuyExplain: %{address} offered to pay %{amount} %{currency} in order to receive NFT token with ID %{tokenID}
events.uriTokenOfferSellExplain: %{address} offered to sell URI token with ID %{tokenID} in order to receive %{amount} %{currency}

events.thisUriTokenOfferCanOnlyBeAcceptedBy: This offer can only be accepted by %{address}

events.theTransactionWillCancelNftOffer: The transaction will cancel %{address}'s offer for NFT offers with ID

events.thisTransactionDoesNotEffectAnyAccountSe: This transaction doesn't affect any account settings.

Please switch to %{network} and try again.

events.thisURITokenOfferMayOnlyBeAcceptedBy: This offer may only be accepted by %{address}

events.claimRewardExplainOptOut: This transaction opts out %{address} to claim rewards in future

settings.enterCurrencyCodeOrName: Adja meg a valuta kódját vagy nevét
settings.notChangingYetBecauseLightMode: Your device is currently in light mode, and automatically switching. The selected dark mode theme will become active when your device is in dark mode.
settings.areYouSureRemoveContact: Biztos, hogy el szeretné távolítani ezt a kapcsolatot?

settings.networkChangeAccountDetailsWarning: Note: by switching from %{from} to %{to}. You may be unable to use your account or view your account history!

settings.biometricUnavailableDescription: Biometric security is unavailable on your device because your device does not offer our requested biometric security level

settings.unableToReRegisteredForPushNotifications: An unexpected error occurred! Unable to re-register for push notifications.
settings.changingThemeNeedsRestartToTakeEffect: Changing the theme will apply after a hard restart of Xaman. If you continue, Xaman will quit. You can then open Xaman again.

settings.unableToRevokeAppAccess: An unexpected error occurred! Unable to revoke app access.
settings.onceYouAuthorizedAppYouWillSeeItHere: Once you authorize access to a third party app you'll see them here.
settings.unableToDeleteNodeWhenConnectedToNetwork: Unable to remove the node while connected to this network, please switch network and try again!
settings.developerModeEnabledWarning: Enabling Developer Mode may reduce certain security functions. Proceed with utmost caution, and only enable it if you comprehend the potential consequences.
settings.disableDeveloperModeRevertNetworkWarning: Please note that this action will change your selected network from '%{currentNetwork}' to '%{defaultNetwork}'. Are you sure you want to proceed?
settings.blockingTakingScreenShotsIsDisabled: Developer mode is active, Screenshot capture protection is temporarily disabled.

settings.syncRailsRemoveNodeWarning: By applying this sync, the current node (%{connectedNode}) to which you are currently connected will be removed. Please select a new default node for this network and try again.
settings.deletingNodeWillRemoveTheNetwork: This is the sole node for this network. Removing this node will also delete the network. Do you wish to proceed?
settings.networkRailsSyncCompleted: A Network Rails szinkronizálás sikeresen befejeződött.
settings.networkRailsAreAlreadyUpdateToDate: Network rails are already up to date
settings.networkRailsSuccessfullyUpdated: Network rails have been successfully updated
settings.changeDefaultNodeInfo: Tap on any node in the list to set it as your preferred default node for the network.
settings.networkHaveOnlyOneNodeAsDefault: This network has only one node, which is already set as the default.
settings.networkAreUpdateToDate: There are no added or changes for network settings at the moment.

account.degenModeExplanation1: To make sure you can recover your account in case of a lost, stolen or damaged device, we ask you to write & re-enter your account secret.
account.degenModeExplanation2: You may choose to defer writing down & re-entering your account secret. Having it written down & stored in a safe place is critical to keeping your account safe.
account.safeMode: Írja le most fiókja titkos kulcsát (biztonságosabb)
account.imSmartPerson: Immediately write down & re-enter your account secret for account recovery.
account.degenBackUpHomeWrn: You are unprotected in case of lost, stolen or damaged phone!
account.imRetard: Write down & re-enter later: all your funds are at risk until you do so!
account.degenModeExplanationConfirm: Are you sure you want to proceed? Until you write down your account secret, you will NOT be able to recover your account if your phone gets lost, stolen or damaged.
account.degenModeNowDone: Wonderful! You're all set! Whenever you have to recover your account, you can do so by importing the account secret you just wrote down.
account.addAccountDescription: Importálja meglévő fiókját, vagy hozzon létre újat.
account.confirmPrivateDescription: Please provide the numbers, this is for your own safety: we want you to confirm you wrote it down.
account.invalidSecretNumber: The numbers entered do not match the requested row of numbers.
account.YouJustCreatedAccount: You have just created a new fresh account.
account.PleaseEnterYourPasswordForAccount: Please enter your password for account
account.pleaseEnterSafePassword: Create an extended length password that is easy to remember, but impossible for others to guess.
account.passwordShouldContain: Your password strength should be at least Fair, please use a long or more difficult password (longer is better).
account.passwordConfirmNotMatch: Your entered passwords do not match
account.chooseWisely: Please choose the security level that suits this account
account.passcodeOptionDesc: This is ideal for daily spending. You can sign transactions by simply showing your face, scanning your finger or entering your passcode.
account.passwordOptionDesc: This option is better for long term storage of XRP and tokens and requires a password to sign transactions
account.hereIsYourPublicKey: Here's your new account. You can now receive funds to the generated public account address.
account.publicKeyCopiedToClipboard: Account address copied to the clipboard
account.writeDownPrivateKey: Write down all the rows on a piece of paper and keep it somewhere safe! If your device crashes and you don't have the secret numbers anymore, your funds are LOST.
account.privateKeyRowsDesc: Only you can touch your funds, but you will have to keep your secret numbers safe. Your secret consists of 8 rows (labelled A-H) containing 6 digits per row.
account.neverSharePrivateKey: Never share your secret numbers (private key) with someone else. If you do, you may lose access to your funds.
account.pleaseWriteDownAllNumbers: Please write down all the numbers
account.goBackClearTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (Any entered inputs will be cleared for security reasons)
account.goBackRefillTheInput:
Are you sure you want to go back? 
 (you have to re-fill all the inputs for security reasons)
account.pleaseSelectAccountSecretType: Please select your account secret type
account.tangemCardEmptyGenerateWalletAlert: Your Tangem card does not contain an account yet. To use this card, an account will have to be generated by the card.
account.tangemLongTapExplain: This mechanism protects the card against proximity attacks: it will enforce a delay between reception and execution of commands.
account.tangemPasscodeExplain: Before the execution of any command entailing a change of the state of the card, you will have to enter the passcode.
account.tangemAccessCodeExplain: Before the execution of any command, you will have to enter the access code.
account.tangemNFCNotSupportedDeviceAlert: Using Tangem cards requires NFC capabilities. Your phone does not seem to support NFC.
account.youCanAlwaysGetFullAccess: You can upgrade a read only account to a full access account later on
account.secretNumbersDesc: Preferred account type. 8 rows of 6 digits
account.pleaseProvideAccountAddress:
Please provide your account address 
(Starts with 'r...')
account.pleaseEnterAllWords: Please enter all your mnemonic words!
account.pleaseProvideMnemonic: Please provide your Mnemonic (24 words) for your account.
account.howManyWordsYourMnemonicIs: How many words does your mnemonic have?
account.invalidHexPrivateKey: Invalid HEX private key! HEX private keys should be 66 HEX characters (A-F, 0-9) long.
account.pleaseProvideFamilySeed: Please provide your account secret (Family Seed) or 66 HEX char. private key.
account.pleaseEnterYourFamilySeed: Adja meg Family Seed-jét / privát kulcsát
account.pleaseChooseAccountLabel: Please enter a name for this account (e.g. 'Spending' or 'Savings').
account.accessLevelChangeAlert: Changing from Read Only to Full Access mode will require you to enter the secret key for your account
account.getStartedCreateAccount: Get started by adding your first account.
account.accountSettingsDescription: Itt szerkesztheti fiók beállításait vagy címkéjét.
account.upgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are upgrading your access level. You need to import your private key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarning: You are downgrading your account access level. Doing so changes your account into a Read Only account, as Xaman will purge the internal, encrypted record of your secret key. You can only access your funds again when you import your secret key again. Only continue if you are certain you have an offline backup of your secret key for this account.
account.downgradingAccessLevelWarningPhysical: You are downgrading your access level. Are you sure?
account.removeTrustLineWarning: You are removing this token from your account. Are you sure?
account.unavailableChangeSecurityLevel: Changing Security level is not available right now
account.accountRemoveWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently from Xaman. Are you sure?
account.accountMaxLabelLengthError: Account label should be less than 64 characters!
account.accountLabelCannotBeMoreThan: Account label cannot be more than 64 characters!
account.activateRegularKeyAccountWarning:
If you want to use this account as Regular key only, you DO NOT have to activate the account.

However, if you want to use this account also to transact, you can activate this account.
account.selectedAccountIsNotActivatedPleaseChoos: Selected account is not activated. To sign this transaction you need to select an activated account!
account.importingSecretAccountExist:
The account secret that you have entered belongs to this r-address and has already been imported into Xaman as a full access account.

%{address}
account.upgradeAccountSecretIsNotMatch: The entered secret belongs to another r-address. If you want to import a regular key, please [Import new account]. If not, please [cancel] and check your entry.
account.masterKeyForThisAccountDisableRegularKey: Master key for this account is disabled and regular key account not found in accounts list!
account.regularKeyAccountForThisAccountDoesNotIm: Regular Key for this account was not imported with sign access!
account.currentPasswordShouldNotBeEmpty: Current Password should not be empty!
account.enteredCurrentPasswordIsInvalid: The current entered password is invalid!
account.allDoneYouCanGoToNextStepNow: You're all set! You can now go to the next step.
account.disableMasterKeyWarning: The transaction DISABLES the private key for the account. This may lock you out. Only continue if you are absolutely sure this is what you want, and you know what you are doing.
account.mnemonicLargeAmountAlert: If you consider importing your mnemonic account while your account holds significant value (eg. your savings, larger amounts tokens), please consider creating a new account in Xaman to keep your mnemonic account offline instead.
account.importExchangeAddressReadonlyWarning:
It is not possible to import your Exchange (deposit) account. Doing so does not allow you to track your own balance on the exchange.

Importing a read only account only works if this is your own, activated account, like the account of your hardware wallet.
account.readOnlyAccountSpendableBalanceWarning: Please note: The access level for this account is Read-Only. There is currently no way to sign transactions that can affect the account state in any form.
account.deleteAccountWarning: This is an Account Delete transaction. When signing your account will be deleted, and all your remaining funds (except for the last %{ownerReserve} reserved %{nativeAsset}, as the fee on the ledger for deleting an account is %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}) will be sent to the configured destination. Please check the destination twice, and ONLY continue if you ACTUALLY want to delete your account on the ledger
account.deleteAccountObjectsExistError: You cannot delete this account, because it contains specific ledger objects, like tokens (non-XRP), Decentralized Exchange (DEX) offers, Escrows (as a creator or beneficiary)
account.deleteAccountSequenceIsNotEnoughError: This account cannot be deleted yet. It takes %{remainingSequence} more ledgers to close before this account can be deleted.
account.unableToCheckAccountObjects: Unable to check for account objects, please make sure you are connected to the node
account.unableToCheckAccountNFTs: Unable to check for account NFTs, please make sure you are connected to the node
account.unableToFetchLedgerSequence: Unable to fetch the current ledger sequence. Please make sure you are connected to the node.
account.unableGetDestinationAccountInfo: Unable to get destination account info, please make sure you are connected to the node
account.unableGetAccountInfo: Unable to fetch account info, please make sure you are connected to the node
account.destinationAccountIsNotActivated: Destination account is not activated, Must be a funded account on the ledger.
account.destinationAddressRequiredDestinationTag: Destination Address requires a Destination Tag
account.destinationAccountAndSourceCannotBeSame: Destination account and source cannot be the same.
account.accountGenerateActivationExplain: Account activation is a requirement on the blockchain (ledger). To activate your account, you will have to make an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountImportActivationExplain: You imported a new account on the ledger. The account is not activated. Account activation is a requirement on the ledger. To activate, you will have to make a first deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}.
account.accountActivateReserveExplain: The first %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} deposited into your account cannot be spent, but will be reserved to keep your account active and pay for on ledger fees.
account.accountReserveNotShownExplain: Your reserved %{nativeAsset} will not show up as balance in Xaman, but you can view your reserve with the "Explain my balance" button in the home screen, above your %{nativeAsset} balance.
account.thisAddressAppearsToBeExchangeAddress:
This address appears to be an exchange address, are you sure you want to continue?

You can never send to this address without respecting the instructions of your exchange.
account.accountDestroyWarning: Your account will be deleted permanently, are you sure?
account.unableToHideAllAccountsError: Unable to hide this account. At least one account should be visible.
account.unableToHideDefaultAccountError: Unable to hide this default account. Change default account and try again.
account.tapAndHoldToReorder: Tap and hold on an item to reorder by the desired priority
account.toTurnYourSecretIntoXrplLedgerAccountPle: If you want to open an account, please enter your secret keys.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountIsGoingToBe: Your account is going to be:
account.importSecretWithoutChecksumWarning:
If you proceed, you will import an account from Secret Numbers. You are the sole party responsible to generate the Secret Numbers. We recommend you to use an offline method (eg. with dice) to generate them. After you generated the numbers, you must store them (eg. stamped in metal, written down).
YOU SHOULD PROCEED ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
account.tangemCardPasscodeSetWarning:
While adding a passcode to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your passcode.

Are you really sure you want to add a passcode to your card?
account.tangemCardAccessCodeSetWarning:
While adding a access code to your card improves the safety of your funds in case of a lost (and found) card, it is important to realize that your funds will be INACCESSIBLE and CAN *NOT* BE RECOVERED (by anyone) if you don't remember your access code.

Are you really sure you want to add a access code to your card?
account.thereAreAccountsEligibleToSign: There are %{signersCount} accounts eligible to sign. Which one do you want to sign with?
account.signatureVerificationExplain: To verify your Tangem card is working correctly and able to sign transactions, we will perform one signing routine to verify transaction signatures generated by your card.
account.yourXRPLedgerAccountWillNotBeTouched: Your account & funds will not be touched.
account.checkWhichAccountsNeedBetterEncryption: Check which accounts need better encryption
account.whyUseThisNewEncryptionMethod: Why use this new encryption method?
account.newEncryptionExplain: Our encryption & security is enhanced to new standards AES256 GCM. You should encrypt your account with this new method to be extra safe. Although you are already safe, it can't hurt to upgrade to the new standards.
account.doNotTurnOffYourPhoneOrQuiteWhileMigrati: Don't turn off your phone or quit the app while doing the encryption.
account.unableToFetchAccountNFTokens: Unable to fetch the account NFT's. Please make sure you are connected to the node.

send.theDestinationAccountDidNotAuthorize: The destination account did not authorize this transaction. Check your selected sending account, or contact the destination account owner.
send.txResultQueuedLongExplain:
Your transaction has been submitted, however, it is currently queued for processing.

Please wait a few minutes and check your transaction history (Events) to see if it has made it through to a final ledger.

Queueing transactions is normal behavior and does not indicate a problem with your transaction: individual nodes can queue transactions if the node or the network is busy.
send.amountIsBiggerThanYourSpend: Ez az összeg több, mint amennyit költhet (%{spendable})
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendIs: The maximum amount you can send is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.theMaxAmountYouCanSendWithFee: The issuer of %{currency} charges a Transfer Fee. The max. amount you can send (respecting the Transfer Fee) is %{spendable} %{currency}
send.trustLineIsFrozenByIssuer: Your Trust Line for the requested asset (%{currency}) has been frozen by the issuer. Please contact the issuer of the asset.
send.balanceIsNotEnoughForFee: Your balance is not enough to cover the fee (%{fee})
send.sourceAndDestinationCannotBeSame: Source and Destination address cannot be the same!
send.transferredSuccessfully: Your transaction has been successfully registered on the %{network}.
send.couldNotVerifyTransaction: Nem sikerült ellenőrizni a tranzakció végleges státuszát
send.verificationFailedDescription:
A tranzakciód sikeresen aláírásra került és elküldésre került, azonban nem tudtuk megerősíteni a tranzakció végleges státuszát.

Ezt okozhatja internetkapcsolat megszakadása vagy megnövekedett terhelés a főkönyvi csomóponton, amelyhez csatlakozol.

Kérjük, manuálisan ellenőrizd, hogy ez a tranzakció megjelenik-e a tranzakciótörténetedben (Események).
send.invalidDestinationTag: The QR-code doesn't contain a valid Destination Tag. Please check the scanned QR-code and try again
send.destinationIsConfirmedAsScam: The destination account is confirmed as SCAM
send.destinationIsProbableIsScam: The destination account is flagged as high risk
send.selectedAccountDoNotSupportAsset: The selected account does not support the selected token.
send.memoPublicWarning: Memo info will be public for everyone
send.destinationNotExistTooLittleToCreate: The destination account hasn't  been used before, and doesn't have a balance. To activate an account on the ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} is required.
send.destinationNotExistCreationWarning:
Sending to the given destination account may be risky: it has never been used and has a zero balance, which is commonly seen in scams. We advise verifying the owner's authenticity to safeguard your assets. If you're confident in its safety but aware of the risks.

If you continue sending to this account, %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} of the %{amount} %{nativeAsset} will be used to activate the account on the ledger.
send.destinationCannotActivateWithIOU: The destination account is not activated as it doesn't hold the ledger enforced minimum balance of %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset}. To activate an account on the ledger, an initial deposit of at least %{baseReserve} %{nativeAsset} has to be sent to the account. Non-%{nativeAsset} tokens cannot be used for the initial deposit.
send.destinationTagIsRequired: The destination tag is required to send this payment.
send.unableGetRecipientAccountInfoPleaseTryAg: Unable to get recipient account info please try again.
send.unableToSetFeesPleaseTryAgain: Unable to set transaction fees, please try again.
send.theDestinationAccountIsSetAsBlackHole: The destination account 'Black Holed', sending to this account will cause losing sent %{currency}.
send.thisAddressRequiredDestinationTag: This address requires a Destination Tag
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveT:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does not have a TrustLine for this token setup to the issuer of this token.
send.unableToSendPaymentRecipientExceedTrustl:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The recipient does exceeds the TrustLine limit for this token.
send.altSendPaymentRecipientDoesNotHaveTrustL: A címzettnek nincs TrustLine-ja ehhez a tokenhez.

Do you want to send a 'Check' instead, so the recipient can opt in to accept the Check which will create the TrustLine?

The recipient will not see an immediate deposit, but will have to accept your Check in their Requests-tab.

On your end, the Check will temporarily increase your reserve with %{reserve} %{asset}, until either the Check is cashed by the recipient, or cancelled by you.

Do you want to send your payment as A 'Remit' transaction instead?

This will automatically create the Trustline in the recipient's account, but you will pay an extra %{reserve} %{asset} to satisfy their TrustLine reserve.
send.unableToSendPaymentTrustLineLimitIsExcee:
Unable to send the token to the recipient.
The 'Limit' for the amount of tokens the recipient wants to hold is exceeded. The recipient will have to update their TrustLine for the token you're sending with a higher 'Limit' to be able to receive this token.
send.destinationTagWarningConfirm: You are sending to an account with destination tag. Please double check the destination tag: if you send to the wrong tag, you will need support of the Destination to retrieve your funds.
send.sendToAccountWithDisallowNativeAssetFlag: The destination account indicates that it doesn't want to receive %{nativeAsset} payments. Only non-%{nativeAsset} payments can be sent to this destination.
send.unableToSendPaymentNotEnoughLiquidity: Unable to send the payment right now due to lack of liquidity.
send.addressIsUnderInvestigationPleaseCancel: This address is under investigation. Please cancel this transaction.
send.toContinueProvideReasonInYourOwnWords: If you want to continue (not recommended) provide a reason in your own words:
send.pleaseEnterYourReasonToContinue: Please enter your reason to continue

asset.selectAnExchangeAndSelectAsset: Select an issuer and select the token you would like to add. This list is maintained by the Xaman team.
asset.successRemoved: A token sikeresen eltávolítva a fiókjából
asset.failedRemove: Hiba: a token nem távolítható el!
asset.trustLineDustRemoveWarning: This TrustLine still contains a really small amount of %{balance} %{currency}. If you continue, it will be sent back to the issuer before your TrustLine is deleted.
asset.dustAmountRemovedYouCanRemoveTrustLineNo: Your dust balance has been sent back to the issuer. The TrustLine can now be eliminated.
asset.addingAssetReserveDescription: Adding a token to your account will increase your enforced account reserve by %{ownerReserve} %{nativeAsset}
asset.unableToRemoveAssetNotInDefaultState: This token cannot be removed from your account. The issuer either added specific settings for this token or their account is not properly configured.
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning: Rippling not turned off for this Trust Line, if you don't know what this is and/or this is not on purpose, please update this setting to prevent potential loss of %{token} tokens
asset.ripplingMisconfigurationWarning2: The TrustLine for this asset does not have 'Rippling' turned off. For regular use, 'Rippling' should be disabled.
asset.lineLimitMisconfigurationWarning: This TrustLine has a limit of zero (0) configured, meaning others cannot send this token to you: you can only hold the token. To be able to receive this token as well, Xaman can update your TrustLine to remove the zero (0) TrustLine limit.
asset.addingTrustLineWarning:
XRPL Labs / Xaman does not endorse any token or token issuer. You should only proceed if you trust the token issuer.
In case of questions or problems regarding the token (TrustLine) you will need to contact the token issuer.

Continue at your own risk.
asset.trustLineIsAlreadyExist: This token already exists. You cannot add the same token again.
asset.issuerAddressCopiedToClipboard: Issuer address copied to the clipboard
asset.unableToLoadListOfTokens: Unable to load the list of tokens!
asset.copyIssuerAddressWarning:
%{issuerAddress}

You are about to copy the Issuer Address. Please note that sending assets to the issuer address will PERMANENTLY BURN THE TOKENS. The Issuer Address for an asset should only be used to verify the legitimacy of the asset.

exchange.failedExchange: Jelenleg nem lehetséges a csere likviditás hiánya vagy frissített átváltási árfolyamok miatt.
exchange.liquidityIsNotEnough: Nincs elég likviditás, most nem lehet cserélni!
exchange.liquidityIsNotSoMuch: There's relatively low liquidity. You can still continue, but you may not get the best rate for your entire exchange!
exchange.exchangeByThirdPartyMessage: If you want to create an offer for execution at a requested price level, you can use the 3rd party Xaman enabled applications to create a limit order.
exchange.requestedLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: there are not enough offers available on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.reverseLiquidityNotAvailable: The amount can't be exchanged: based on the lack of offers on the Decentralized Exchange, you would not be able to exchange it back.
exchange.maxSpreadExceeded: The price difference between selling and buying offers is too high.
exchange.maxSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.maxReverseSlippageExceeded: The exchange rate will be bad if you would try to exchange back, as there are not enough (good) offers on the Decentralized Exchange.
exchange.slippageSpreadWarning:
The exchange rate displayed is an estimate based on the current offers available on the ledger Decentralized Exchange.
When you execute this trade and the liquidity changed while executing your transaction, you may get an up to %{slippage}% worse exchange rate. Please only continue if you accept this

scan.pleaseScanAccountAddress: Kérem, olvassa be a %{nativeAsset} cím QR-t
scan.scannedQRIsNotAccountAddress: A beolvasott QR kód nem tartalmaz érvényes %{nativeAsset} címet!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainAccountAddre: A vágólap adat nem tartalmaz érvényes %{nativeAsset} címet!
scan.scannedQRIsNotXamanPayload: A beolvasott QR kód nem Xaman adattartalom!
scan.theClipboardDataIsNotContainXamanPayload: A vágólap adat nem tartalmaz érvényes Xaman adattartalmat!
scan.theQRIsNotWhatWeExpect: Ez a QR kód nem tartalmazza a várt információt!
scan.invalidQRTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Érvénytelen QR kód (Xaman számára), próbáljon újat vagy próbálja újra
scan.invalidClipboardDateTryNewOneOrTryAgain: Invalid clipboard data (for Xaman). Try a new one or try again.

payload.UnableVerifyPayload: Nem sikerült ellenőrizni az adattartalom aláírást
payload.payloadAlreadyResolved: This payload has already been signed or rejected. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.payloadExpired: This payload has expired. Please repeat the process that generated the request, and scan the new request.
payload.payloadAlreadySigned: Az adattartalom már alá lett írva
payload.invalidOrMissingSignedTransactionBlob: Érvénytelen vagy hiányzó aláírt tranzakció blob
payload.unexpectedPayloadErrorOccurred: A payload érvénytelen, és automatikusan elutasításra kerül.
payload.whatDoYouWantToDo: What do you want to do?
payload.willIgnoreTheRequestAndClose: will ignore the request and close.
payload.notEnoughLiquidityToSendThisPayment: Not enough liquidity to send this payment.
payload.unableToCheckAssetConversion: Unable to verify the token exchange rate. Please make sure you are properly connected to the internet
payload.unableToGetNetworkFee: Unable to get network fee, please make sure you are connected to the network node
payload.checkCanOnlyCashByCheckDestination: A Check can only be cashed if the Check destination account is present in Xaman in Read/Write (or regular key) mode.
payload.unableToGetCheckObject: Unable to get check object. Please make sure you are connected to the network node
payload.checkObjectDoesNotExist: Unable to get the Check object. Please make sure the Check exists on the ledger.
payload.nonExpiredCheckCanOnlyCancelByCreatedAcc: A (non expired) check can only be cancelled by the account that created it or destination account.
payload.accountDeleteExchangeSupportWarning: Note: when deleting your account and sending the remaining balance to an exchange, make sure the destination exchange supports deposits using AccountDelete transactions. Not all exchanges do, which results in a support procedure with the exchange to get your funds credited to your account
payload.notVettedTokenTradeWarning:
Trade at your own risk! The token you are about to trade **has not been vetted**.

Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects. If you trade this token, you may not be able to sell it back. You are potentially putting your assets/savings at risk!
payload.tradeEntireTokenWorthWarning: Warning: the amount of %{currency} is equal to or higher than your %{currency} balance of this asset. If this offer is executed, you will fully liquidate your %{currency} position.
payload.paymentToDisallowedNativeAssetWarning: The destination account configured their account to disallow incoming %{nativeAsset} (non-token) payments. If you proceed, you will most likely need support from the destination account owner.
payload.paymentToBlackHoledAccountWarning: The destination account is 'black holed', meaning all funds sent to the destination account will be inaccessible & unrecoverable. Are you sure you want to continue sending your funds to this destination account?
payload.unableToFindTheOfferObject: Unable to find the offer object!
payload.theIssuerCanBurnThisToken: Note: The issuer can burn this token.
payload.payloadForceNetworkError: This payload is not available on the network you are connected with
payload.pleaseSwitchToNetworkAndTryAgain: Kérem, váltson %{network} hálózatra és próbálja újra
payload.oracleDocumentIdCopiedToClipboard: Oracle Document Id copied to clipboard
payload.didDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the Decentralized Identifier (DID) tied to the selected account. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.
payload.oracleDeleteWarning: Warning: You are about to delete the oracle record identified by the above Oracle Document ID. Keep in mind, this action cannot be undone.

monetization.comingPaymentWarning: You're still enjoying Xaman for free, but you're nearing our free limit. To support Xaman's innovation and security, a small in-app payment may be requested soon.
monetization.paymentRequiredMessage: A small payment is required to maintain unlimited access for the next 30 days. Alternatively, Xaman will switch to limited-use mode until your monthly limits reset automatically.
monetization.prePurchaseMessage: You're currently unable to open xApps and sign requests. A small payment is required to unlock 30 days of unrestricted access to Xaman.
monetization.monetizationRequiredForThisFeature: You currently can’t open Sign Requests & xApps: a small payment is required to unlock a 30 days of unrestricted use of Xaman. Developing Xaman, building secure software takes a lot of resources. We hope you will support us continuing to build. If you decide not to: every month your limits will reset, allowing you to open xApps & Sign Requests again.
monetization.noPreviousPurchases: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore. If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.
monetization.errorRestorePurchase:
An unexpected error occurred while checking your purchase history.

Please try again later or contact our support team if the issue persists.
monetization.couldNotFetchProductDetails: Error fetching product details. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
monetization.unlockFullFunctionality: Unlock full functionality with a small payment.
monetization.prePurchaseTipIos: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Apple ID is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.
monetization.prePurchaseTipAndroid: Please note that this is a 30 days purchase. Make sure your Google account is logged in and your payment information is up-to-date. For issues, use the 'Restore Purchase' button.

errors.unableToLoadTermOfService: Hoppá! Nem sikerült lekérni a szolgáltatási feltételeket
errors.unableToLoadCredits: Hoppá! Nem sikerült lekérdezni a krediteket
errors.unableToLoadChangeLogs: Hoppá! Nem sikerült lekérni a változási naplókat
errors.tecPATH_DRY:
The transaction didn't work because funds couldn't be moved between the two accounts, or could not be moved at the requested exchange rate.

This might be because the two accounts involved don't have a connection (TrustLine) that allows them to exchange money with each other, or the transaction didn't work because there wasn't enough money available to move between the two accounts.
errors.tecPATH_PARTIAL: The transaction didn't go through because there weren't enough tokens available to send the complete amount at the requested exchange rate between the two accounts.
errors.tecHOOK_REJECTED:
Hook elutasította a küldő vagy fogadó fióknál.

%{hookReturnString}

txBatch.title: Köteg
txBatch.thisTxIsPartOfBatchTransaction: This transaction is part of a Batch transaction.
txBatch.thisIsAnBatchTransaction: This is a Batch transaction with %{signers} separate 'inner Batch transaction' signer(s) and %{txs} transaction(s) in the batch.
txBatch.batchExecution_tfAllOrNothing: atomikusan, tehát vagy mind sikerül, vagy mind sikertelen
txBatch.batchExecution_tfOnlyOne: to process only the first successful transaction, all others are either failed or not tried (because one already succeeded)
txBatch.batchExecution_tfUntilFailure: until one fails, all others are either failed or not tried (because others already succeeded)
txBatch.batchExecution_tfIndependent: függetlenül, tehát minden belső tranzakció egyedileg sikerülhet vagy sikertelen lehet

txDelegateSet.dangerousPerms:
Transaction types with far-reaching consequences are included:

%{perms}.

Only proceed if the authorized account is your own, and you know what you are doing.
txDelegateSet.itRemovesTheAccountAuthorize: Fully remove (retract) all authorization(s) to the following account:
txDelegateSet.itRemoves: It fully removes (retract(s)) all authorization(s) to the following account: %{authorize}.

txCredentialSet.paymentBeingUsed: This transaction automatically uses a valid Credential you own to authorize this transaction.

mptokenIssuance.explain: This is an MPToken Issuance. Other accounts can now Authorize this MPToken to be sent to them, after which MPTokens can be issued by sending a payment.

mptoken.explain: Ez egy MPToken, amit %{issuer} bocsátott ki.
mptoken.explainAuthOnly: This is an MPToken Authorization: you are not holding the MPToken yet, but did authorize this Token to be sent to you.
mptoken.issuanceNotFound: Nem sikerült lekérdezni az MPT kibocsátási részleteket

permissionedDomain.eventThisIsA: This is a Permissioned Domain. A permissioned domain is like an on chain members-only area, so only credential-verified accounts can participate in certain transactions. This can, for example, allow for regulated spaces within decentralized systems.
permissionedDomain.title: Engedélyezett Domain
permissionedDomain.txThisCreates:
This transaction creates a new Permissioned Domain.

A permissioned domain is like an on chain members-only area, so only credential-verified accounts can participate in certain transactions. This can, for example, allow for regulated spaces within decentralized systems.
permissionedDomain.txThisUpdates: Ez a tranzakció frissít egy meglévő engedélyezett Domain-t.
permissionedDomain.thisTxRemovesDomainId: Ez a tranzakció eltávolít egy engedélyezett Domain-t a Domain ID-val: %{domainId}.

depositPreauth.title: Befizetési előengedélyezés
depositPreauth.eventThisIsA: This is a Deposit Preauthorisation. A deposit preauthorisation allows only a specific set of accounts, or accounts holding a specific Credential to deposit (if this is enabled on the receiving account).

cronSet.title: CronSet
cronSet.invalidParams:
Invalid Cron parameters.

Missing mandatory fields: Either StartTime must be present to schedule a new Cron, or Flags must be '1' (int) to remove an existing Cron.
cronSet.invalidParamsUnset:
Invalid Cron parameters for a 'tfCronUnset' transaction.

When removing a Cron using `tfCronUnset` (Flags: 1), the StartTime, RepeatCount and DelaySeconds must be omitted.
cronSet.setOrUpdate: This payload will create or update an existing Cron (scheduled Hook invoke).
cronSet.didCreateOrUpdate: This payload created or updated an existing Cron (scheduled Hook invoke).
cronSet.removeCron: This payload will remove any existing Cron configuration (scheduled Hook invoke).
cronSet.didRemoveCron: This payload removed an existing Cron configuration (scheduled Hook invoke).

xamanServiceFee.updateToSatisfyMissingAmount: Kérem, frissítse a tranzakcióját, hogy legfeljebb %{amount}-ot költsön

payloadRiskWarning.postAcceptedHeader: Figyelmeztetés: A Xaman SOHA nem kéri, hogy küldjön fizetést a Xamannak. A Xaman csapata NEM küld airdropokat, és NEM kínál ingyenes jutalmakat vagy kriptovalutát a felhasználóknak.
payloadRiskWarning.ifSomeoneThenScam: Ha valaki arra kéri, hogy küldjön fizetést a Xamannak, utasítsa el: valaki megpróbálja átver ni Önt.
payloadRiskWarning.onlyProceedIf: Csak akkor folytassa, ha 100%-ig biztos abban, hogy megbízható féllel áll kapcsolatban, és ha 100%-ig biztos abban, hogy folytatni szeretné.
payloadRiskWarning.beforeTransactionSomeQuestions: Már majdnem kész van, de mielőtt folytathatná a tranzakció részleteivel, néhány kérdést kell feltennünk Önnek.
payloadRiskWarning.isSomeonePromising: Ígér Önnek valaki ingyenes jutalmakat, airdropokat vagy kriptovalutát?
payloadRiskWarning.isSomeoneSupport: Kéri-e Önt valaki, aki támogatást kínál, hogy írja alá ezt a tranzakciót?
payloadRiskWarning.isSomeoneTeam: Kéri-e Önt valaki, aki azt állítja, hogy a Xaman, XRPL Labs vagy Ripple csapat tagja, hogy írja alá ezt a tranzakciót?
